column1: Table 1: The number of deaths registered was above the five-year average in the majority of the English regions and Wales
Number of deaths in Wales and the regions in England, registered week ending 2 October 2020

column2: Office for National Statistics - Deaths registered weekly in England and Wales
Based on area of usual residence. Geographic boundaries are based on the most up-to-date information available at the time of publication.
Based on date a death was registered rather than occurred.

The averages are based on the number of death registrations in each region, recorded for each corresponding week over the previous five years. Moveable public holidays, when register offices are closed, affect the number of registrations made in the published weeks and in the corresponding weeks in previous years.
